headers.value: default-src 'self'; img-src * data: blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https:; connect-src *; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://drive.google.com https://lh3.googleusercontent.com https://www.instagram.com; font-src * data:;
